meanings.definition: Of or relating to the elaborate Spanish Baroque style of architecture characterized by intricate ornamentation.
meanings.sent1: The churrigueresque design of the cathedral showcased intricate details.
meanings.sent2: The palace was decorated in a churrigueresque style with elaborate carvings.
meanings.sent3: The churrigueresque fountain in the park looked like a fancy cake decoration.
meanings.sent4: Her churrigueresque jewelry box was a miniature masterpiece of design.
meanings.sent5: The churrigueresque facade of the building was a sight to behold.

meanings.definition: Excessively ornate or flamboyant in style.
meanings.sent1: The churrigueresque gown she wore to the party was eye-catching.
meanings.sent2: The room was filled with churrigueresque furniture that overwhelmed the space.
meanings.sent3: His churrigueresque hairstyle made him stand out in the crowd.
meanings.sent4: The cake was decorated in a churrigueresque manner, almost too beautiful to eat.
meanings.sent5: The churrigueresque painting was so detailed, it seemed to come to life.
